sectionTDesc: Some technologies/framework that I use for the realization of the projects
section2Desc: I have followed professional training as well as an application in the following areas
section3Desc: Here are some recent projects, please consult my GitHub repository to have all of my projects..
section4Desc: Please complete the following form to contact me
section5Desc: I write articles about tech and computer programming on DevTo and Medium. Discover my latest articles here
about:
I am a web developer and designer with a passion for creating websites and applications with a modern and intuitive aesthetic. Since my beginnings in the industry 5 years ago, I have worked on numerous projects for clients from all walks of life, ranging from innovative startups to established companies.

I have a solid background in IT and design, and I gained a lot of experience working on team and solo projects. My goal is to create sites and applications that not only meet my clients' needs, but exceed their expectations.

I am constantly on the lookout for new opportunities for collaboration and professional challenges. If you are interested in my services or if you want to know more about me and my work, do not hesitate to contact me

knowledge.title: Website Delevopment
knowledge.desc: Design of showcase website, blog, forum...

knowledge.title: Android Developer
knowledge.desc: PWA & Native application under Kotlin or Hybrid under Ionic...

knowledge.title: UX/UI
knowledge.desc: Design of company logo, web & mobile application mockup...

JavaScript.name: Futura.js
JavaScript.desc: A small JavaScript library for common tasks such as carousel, exceptions, animation handler, appear on scroll, auto-write texts, count numbers and more...

TypeScript.name: web-task-automatisation
TypeScript.desc: This project was created in order to automate a task on a web platform. It allows you to connect to a user account and click on a button to mark your online presence. In addition, it automatically disconnects at a given time.

Python/Django.name: gTube
Python/Django.desc: A small web application for downloading youtube videos in various formats that works a bit like the famous savefrom.net

Python/Django.name: LTN CONDUITE
Python/Django.desc: A small web application designed for the first time on behalf of the Lycée Technique de Natitingou for the vote of the pipes by the teachers for each class. It is mainly written with the Django framework and using JQuery in Front.

Laravel.name: gMarket
Laravel.desc: E-commerce site for the sale of digital material designed in Laravel 8 & VanillaJS with integrated CMS

Laravel.name: Futura-Vision API
Laravel.desc: REST API written in Laravel for the futuraVision app with authentication token system.

CodeIngniter.name: Neptune
CodeIngniter.desc: Neptune is a stock management web application with automatic invoicing system, stock management of the different shops designed in CodeIngniter4 & VanillaJS & JQuery

PHP.name: gGallery
PHP.desc: A small web application written in PHP working as a web gallery, to store images, videos, documents... with a sending system without reloading the page.

VueJS/Angular.name: Futura-Vision
VueJS/Angular.desc: Showcase site developed in vue.js working with a Laravel API with integrated Blog & Forum as well as a CMS

VueJS/Angular.name: My Portfolio
VueJS/Angular.desc: It is this same portfolio that illustrates my skills as a full stack web & mobile developer.
